name: Agentic Kit Official
description: Official marketplace for Agentic Kit - a comprehensive toolkit with 13 specialized agents and 14 powerful skills for AI-driven software development

plugins.name: agentic-kit-standard
plugins.description: Standard variant with 13 agents and 8 skills (recommended for most users)
plugins.recommended_for: Most users, general-purpose development, content creation

plugins.name: agentic-kit-lite
plugins.description: Lite variant with 3 core agents and no skills for minimal dependencies
plugins.recommended_for: Minimal CI/CD pipelines, embedded systems, low-resource environments

plugins.name: agentic-kit-pro
plugins.description: Pro variant with all 13 agents and 14 skills for maximum capabilities
plugins.recommended_for: Advanced users, designers, developers requiring full feature set
